question: 駆ける
sourceAnswer:
to: run/dash/race | gallop-(on-horseback)/canter | advance-(against-one's-enemy)/charge-(on-horseback)
<tag><ja>翔る</ja></tag>:: to: soar/fly | run/dash
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>gallop</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to gallop</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You learned this reading when you learned the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
